channel.title: CVE Feed for Canonical -- Ubuntu Kernel
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Canonical -- Ubuntu Kernel

item.title: CVE-2023-32629|2024-08-02T15:25:36.941Z -- canonical -- ubuntu%20kernel
item.description: Local privilege escalation vulnerability in Ubuntu Kernels overlayfs ovl_copy_up_meta_inode_data skip permission checks when calling ovl_do_setxattr on Ubuntu kernels

item.title: CVE-2023-2640|2024-08-02T06:26:09.894Z -- canonical -- ubuntu%20kernel
item.description: On Ubuntu kernels carrying both c914c0e27eb0 and "UBUNTU: SAUCE: overlayfs: Skip permission checking for trusted.overlayfs.* xattrs", an unprivileged user may set privileged extended attributes on the mounted files, leading them to be set on the upper files without the appropriate security checks.
